funkatronics.code.tactilewaves.dsp.toolbox

Class Filter

  • java.lang.Object
    • funkatronics.code.tactilewaves.dsp.toolbox.Filter

  • public class Filter
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for filtering data series using recursive filters

    Butterworth, Critically Damped, and Bessel filter types are supported via instantiation with an arbitrary number of poles. A static method for filtering using any provided filter coefficients is available for custom filtering.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Filter

        public Filter(float Fc,
              boolean highPass)
        Construct a default filter
        Parameters:
        Fc - the cutoff frequency, as a fraction of the sample rate (0.0-0.5)
        highPass - is this filter a high pass filter?

      • Filter

        public Filter(float Fc,
              int NP,
              int filterType,
              boolean highPass)
        Construct a new Filter object with these parameters
        Parameters:
        Fc - the cutoff frequency, as a fraction of the sample rate (0.0-0.5)
        NP - the number of poles of the filter
        filterType - the type of filter to use
        highPass - is this filter a high pass filter?

    • Method Detail

      • enableHighPass

        public void enableHighPass(boolean highPass)
        Enable or disable the high pass flag
        Parameters:
        highPass - true to enable high pass filtering, false for low pass

      • setFilterType

        public void setFilterType(int filterType)
        Sets the filter type of this fiter
        Parameters:
        filterType - the type of filter to use, chosen from FILTER_BUTTERWORTH, FILTER_CRITICALLY_DAMPED, or FILTER_BESSEL.
